column5: @zenstrategist Doesn't the same philosophy apply to the people fixing the robot?  :-)  I'm not saying either way is better, but it's interesting to watch this new wave of automation develop...

Look out SpongeBob, the robots are coming...

https://t.co/u4kbp6V9Fm
@PracticePalMus @FutureFwdHQ Thanks guys! Was great to meet you yesterday and love the mission you're on - look forward to hearing more of your success!
Love this @pjf_paul!
@AdAstraTrust @AyresomePrimary I’d love to!  We’re hoping to do more on digital and local primary schools with @mbrocollege - be great to connect the dots!

Really looking forward to talking to the fab @LionHeartfelt tonight on @BBCRadioLondon about how the past can shape our future and what life in 2050 might be like - come and join us and let us know what you think the future might hold for us!

https://t.co/QGLmt6jBGD

Ever wondered what it might be like to run your business in 2050?  

Working with the fab folks @VirginMoney I took a glimpse into the future to explore what might happen - take a look into the future with us and let us how you think it might change!

https://t.co/YPLyRC20gU

Early start this morning for a radio day for a client.  Pre-pandemic this would have been a day in a basement studio in London - now it's from the comfort of my home studio...

#silverlinings #radio #SME2050 https://t.co/3oHb2L43fE

If you're an organisation that's struggling to find the best way forward with Cyber Security, the government's latest 80 page report feels a little bit daunting.  Thankfully, here's an excellent piece from @cronky to guide you through the key principles:
https://t.co/jXRWsZVpgz

@wearecognitive @LondonersLondon @theRSAorg @MarDixon @charlotteh71 @street_storage @turtleandturtle @bullringbash1 @ItsGroundswell @homelessimpact @RSAinLondon @RSAEvents @Anthony_Luvera Looking good @wearecognitive - looks like you've got this "working" from home malarkey down to a fine art.  I suspect the domestic patios of the world have never known such love...  HNY everyone!

I recently joined experts @hdduncan and @BillMew for @HuaweiUK's excellent Tech Podcast. 

I wrote a blog post about my contribution which centres around how the best thing to come out of 2022 will be our new-found relationship with technology.

https://t.co/q3WAQXCyZ3

This @GoogleTrends chart tells two stories:

1) Countries most worried about Omicron variant.
2) Countries that don't use Google... https://t.co/EL60AcIBEB

Had an absolute blast this week talking on @HuaweiUK's #TechPodcast with @hdduncan and @BillMew talking about some of the standout tech moments from 2021 and what we might look forward to in 2022.

You can check it out here:
https://t.co/Tg88qj9JaH

One of the best projects I’ve worked on through the pandemic is to help my Dad get his book on “Engineering Sustainable Life on Earth” published.   

I have a couple of review copies up for grabs, DM me and I’ll send one over if you’re interested! https://t.co/jD97glcOgS
@EliseQuevedo Likewise Elise!  Have a great day!

It's beginning to feel a lot like... Predictions season!  First prediction session for 2022 is up today with @HuaweiUK live at 12pm on Twitter Spaces - come along and join in the conversation with me, @hdduncan and @BillMew - be great to have you there!

https://t.co/zjlMj40B1I https://t.co/ORHPQSqSDE

@HuaweiUK @OmdiaHQ @BillMew @fastfuture @hdduncan @EliseQuevedo @Chr1sLew1s @sallyeaves Without a doubt it does!  We've learnt recently that broadband is more important than commute times and certainly better value for money...  The challenge for the UK remains how quickly can we make it available for everyone?

Some of you were asking for the full interview with @PolarDecisions for his new book "Audacious Goals - Remarkable Results" so here it is...

Hope you enjoy it!
https://t.co/B0dLq0NSKn https://t.co/QX3RiTUDXh

I recently caught with @PolarDecisions to talk about his latest book - "Audacious Goals - Remarkable Results".
It's a fascinating read about 3 of history's great achievers and what we can learn from them in modern day life.

You can check it out here:
https://t.co/iqibfXyPq3 https://t.co/LdmdHnPLMv

It was my absolute pleasure recently to talk to the fab @bradbox and the @endava team about the future and the skills we're all going to need to make it one worth having.

You can hear this + many other great conversations on their Tech Reimagined podcast:
https://t.co/Qh3HddHlUO

Absolutely thrilled to be providing the opening keynote for @SpaceCommExpo - the UK's first trade exhibition dedicated to the commercial future of space.  It's free to attend too! 

Head over to https://t.co/kE9iAmwSv1 for more details.

Hope to see you there! https://t.co/QxoiuA6fjg

Just one day to go for the brilliant @Exclaimer Signature Summit.  It's free to join and there's an incredible line up of speakers and content - we'd love to hear your voice in the conversation!

You can register with the link below, hope to see you there!
https://t.co/3vNCbfcNN6 https://t.co/9P8tXhCpOn

Absolutely thrilled to be providing the opening keynote for the fab folks @Exclaimer, for their (free) flagship event on the future of work on July 1st.  It's going to be a great conversation and we'd love it if you could join us! 

You can sign up here:  https://t.co/3vNCbfcNN6 https://t.co/lU1oZgBnuz

@wearecognitive My thoughts exactly.  I was thinking the patio needs some low-height partitioning, and I need to install a corner desk to sit at so I can drive up the anxiety in the herd. Either way, I know I'm never going back to the office... https://t.co/kc1DGm1EGe

It is with a delightful sense of irony, that I find myself at home, working on my patio, while "working from home"...

Any tips @wearecognitive? https://t.co/YETo7CspFA
@wearecognitive @theRSAorg Brought back wonderful memories of the discussions of the office savannah and the predator in corner! It's at 03:04 in your fabulous video! https://t.co/BZIlWniB6D

Absolutely thrilled to be able to provide the keynote for the @BrilliantClub's virtual graduation.

What an incredible programme and what amazing achievements by the students.  You should all be super proud of yourselves!

Here's my view of the ceremony!

#ScholarsProgrammeGrad https://t.co/zcvEUt8rpW

You can sign up here: https://t.co/g5KBySdxAK https://t.co/KBKWQxTBI3
